text: For today, only B&H Photo has the Angler HiKey Illuminated Background (6 x 7′) on sale. These are great for high-key portrait photography. You can mcgyver solutions up for this, been there, done that. But these do make the task so much easier.Angler HiKey Illuminated Background Collapsible and ReversibleZippered Side Slots for Light PlacementFree-Standing DesignCollapses to One-Third Size for StorageIncludes Carrying CaseThe HiKey Illuminated Background from Angler is a 6 x 7′ free-standing background that can be internally illuminated using strobe or LED light sources, allowing photographers to take photos with the light behind their subject. It acts like a giant 6 x 7′ softbox, making it simple to shoot high-key photos of portraits, products, and fashion. Zippered openings on each side of the background make it easy to insert a strobe or LED monolight, with a reflector. Doing this evenly lights the background from each side, filling it with light. Freely stand the background up in a studio or on location, and the flexible frame allows the background to collapse down to one-third its size for portability and storageIlluminated BackgroundThe HiKey Illuminated Background lights a subject from behind like a large softbox. Easily eliminate extra shadows on the background and produce HiKey images for portraits, products, and style.Free Standing DesignA sturdy, integrated metal frame and four frame supports allow the Illuminated Background to freely stand on its own. So, no matter where it is set up, you can have background lighting behind your subject.Flexible FrameA flexible frame allows the background to collapse down to one third its size. The 19″ deep background has ample room to accommodate a variety of light units.Touch Fastener Background AttachmentA touch-fastener strip around the edge enables attaching backgrounds or colored fabrics to alter the lights color. html:
For today, only B&H Photo has the Angler HiKey Illuminated Background (6 x 7′) on sale. These are great for high-key portrait photography. You can mcgyver solutions up for this, been there, done that. But these do make the task so much easier.

Angler HiKey Illuminated Background

  • Collapsible and Reversible
  • Zippered Side Slots for Light Placement
  • Free-Standing Design
  • Collapses to One-Third Size for Storage
  • Includes Carrying Case

The HiKey Illuminated Background from Angler is a 6 x 7′ free-standing background that can be internally illuminated using strobe or LED light sources, allowing photographers to take photos with the light behind their subject. It acts like a giant 6 x 7′ softbox, making it simple to shoot high-key photos of portraits, products, and fashion. Zippered openings on each side of the background make it easy to insert a strobe or LED monolight, with a reflector. Doing this evenly lights the background from each side, filling it with light. Freely stand the background up in a studio or on location, and the flexible frame allows the background to collapse down to one-third its size for portability and storage

Illuminated Background

The HiKey Illuminated Background lights a subject from behind like a large softbox. Easily eliminate extra shadows on the background and produce HiKey images for portraits, products, and style.

Free Standing Design

A sturdy, integrated metal frame and four frame supports allow the Illuminated Background to freely stand on its own. So, no matter where it is set up, you can have background lighting behind your subject.

Flexible Frame

A flexible frame allows the background to collapse down to one third its size. This allows the background to be easily transported from one location to another or stored in the included carrying case.

Side Lighting

Large, zippered openings on each side of the Illuminated Background make it easy to insert strobe and LED monolights, with reflectors, into the background maximizing the light output with an even spread from each side. The 19″ deep background has ample room to accommodate a variety of light units.

Touch Fastener Background Attachment

A touch-fastener strip around the edge enables attaching backgrounds or colored fabrics to alter the lights color. Change a photo’s mood without having to carry spools of paper.

When you purchase through links on our site, we may earn an affiliate commission. Here's how it works.
